mapper.insert: insert into game (appid, name, developer, publisher, initialprice, finalprice,discountrate,description,platform,meta,category,genre,screenshot,movie,releasedate,achievement,positive,ccu) values (#{appid},#{name},#{developer, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{publisher, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{initialprice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalprice, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{discountrate},#{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{platform, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meta},#{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{genre, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{screenshot, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{movie, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releasedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{achievement, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{positive},#{ccu})
